ruin     	29->30		0.001060	0.398		58.293		19621.0
legacy   	28->29		0.000229	0.011		58.311		19809.0
legacy   	29->30		0.000317	0.119		58.499		20184.0

*efficiency is (morally) fd gain divided by fragment cost. Overall efficiency
should decrease as you move down the list. You may note a few times
where this doesn't happens, most noticeably with legacy. This is because
the fd increase every 3 levels gets amoratized over the previous levels.
So you get situations where the efficiency increases as you get closer to
the breakpoint. This behavior is expected if slightly unintuitive.
